paper_title: Morphisms and extensions between bricks over preprojective algebras of type A
abstract: The bricks over preprojective algebras of type A are known to be in bijection with certain combinatorial objects called "arcs". In this paper, we show how one can use arcs to compute bases for the Hom-spaces and first extension spaces between bricks. We then use this description to classify the "weak exceptional sequences" over these algebras. Finally, we explain how our result relates to a similar combinatorial model for the exceptional sequences over hereditary algebras of type A.
